TxRateToken: function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function allowance(address owner, address spender) view returns (uint256)
function getReferralInfo(address user) view returns (address, uint256, uint256)
TxRateLending: function getUserPosition(address user, address token) view returns (tuple(uint256 supplied, uint256 borrowed, uint256 lastUpdateTime, uint256 accruedInterest))
function getPoolInfo(address token) view returns (tuple(address token, uint256 totalSupply, uint256 totalBorrow, uint256 supplyRate, uint256 borrowRate, uint256 collateralFactor, bool isActive))
ERC20: function transfer(address to, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function approve(address spender, uint256 amount) returns (bool)
function allowance(address owner, address spender) view returns (uint256)
